title: Preparing for Autumn
detail_text: <:th_ch0107/>Maru can’t see what’s ahead, zura..... Aaahhh!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Are you okay, Hanamaru?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Mari-chan, nice catch! Maru thought she’d drop all of the books she borrowed.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>That’s a lot of books.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Ehehe. Maru gathered all of the books that she wanted to read this autumn.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Autumn books......? That’s a thing?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Maru thought it’d be a good idea. When it starts getting colder, Maru ends up wanting to read poetry anthologies.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Really? That sounds different from what you usually read.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Pure literature is always great to read, zura! But this is the kind of thing Maru likes to read during this season!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Fufu, I see. It’s Hanamaru’s way of welcoming autumn. Could you recommend something for Mari to read too~!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
